system_description: ScanlonSoft Retail Solution. A SaaS platform running in Azure that provide point of sale retail software to small business. React frontend, with APIs hosted in Azure App Service on the backend and an Azure SQL Database.
issue_summary: Customer reports occasional slow loading times on backend API requests.

conversation_history.message: Hi, I've noticed that sometimes the system takes longer to process transactions. It’s not frequent but happens occasionally.
Thanks for bringing this to our attention, Jane. Could you let us know the approximate times you experienced the slowdown? Any specific actions or patterns you noticed?
It usually happens in the afternoon, around 2-3 PM, when I’m processing larger orders. No specific error messages, just slower responses.
Got it, Jane. We’ll start investigating if there are any spikes in server load or network latency during that time. I’ll keep you posted.
Okay, thank you! Let me know if you need more details from my end.
